alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 25 at 1:45PM PDT until October 27 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 possible. * WHERE...In California, the valleys of Siskiyou County, including Scott Valley. In Oregon, the valleys of Central Douglas County, Josephine County he Scott Valley. and Jackson County including Medford, Cave Junction, Applegate, Shady Cove and Selma. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a 60-80% probability for most of Jackson County to see freezing temperatures Thursday night. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
